DOC.brief_summary: 6 months open label non-interventional observational study acc to § 4, section 23 and § 67, section 6 German Medicines Act with two parallel groups 1. the SMS group receiving a daily SMS - a reminder to inhale Spiriva® 18 Microgram 2. the control group not receiving a daily SMS reminder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) patients requiring longacting bronchodilators according to approved Summary of Product Characteristics (SPC) and guidelines User of mobile phone Exclusion criteria: Patients presenting with the general and specific contraindications listed in the Patient Information Leaflet and the SPC
